content.description:
LARGEST CITIES IN VIETNAM AND THAILAND, 2018

City
 Population

Bangkok, Thailand
 10.2 million

Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
 8.1 million

Hanoi, Vietnam
 4.3 million

Chon Buri, Thailand
 1.4 million

Source: United Nations
content.question: Which of the following accurately describes the city population data in the table?

choices.label: Bangkok is both a metacity and a primate city.
Hanoi is both a world city and a primate city.
Ho Chi Minh City is both a megacity and a primate city.
Hanoi is both a capital city and a primate city.
Bangkok is both a megacity and a primate city.

content.answer: Bangkok is both a megacity and a primate city.

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

topic.text: 6.4: The Size and Distribution of Cities

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
